/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy over the road. The buildings on either side of the street are white, their red roofs adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding a unique perspective to the view.
